ygData.subject: Re: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: verants poed about tweeking then just put a lvl limit on the item cant be worn till ** lvl thats what muds have and it works very well. I like this idea to.
ygData.messageBody:
"verants poed about tweeking then just put a lvl limit on the item cant be
worn till ** lvl thats what muds have and it works very well."

I like this idea to. I have also seen similar things done in other typs of
games. A person would not be able to use cetain items untill their
profiency in that skill is high enough to use it. Since skill levels are
based on character level this shouldn't be too difficult to so. Of course i
am no programer so waht do I know.
